duties_responsibilities.duty: Provides technical leadership for the design, maintenance, repair and operation of key facilities and building systems.
Recommends and implements improvements along with capacity and distribution planning.
Plans, designs and maintains the infrastructure of the entire facility.
Identifies and evaluates energy and space optimization opportunities.
Ensures compliance to ISO 14001 Environmental Management System Standards.
Works with both Celestica Corporate and site Energy group to meet site energy objectives and to develop implementation schedules and ongoing support plans.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in a related field, or an equivalent combination of education and experience. Educational requirements may vary by geography.
